tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished 152nd at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played in 11 events on the Mackenzie Tour...Finished T16 at the PC Financial Open to start the season. Regrouped after a first-round 75 to shoot rounds of 68-69-69...Carded his first top 10 of the season at The Players Cup with a T8 finish...Recorded his first career win on the Mackenzie Tour after shooting back-to-back rounds of 8-under 64 to win the Wildfire Invitational by four strokes over David Skinns. He was one shot behind Skinns and Chase Marinell after three rounds, but finished off a convincing victory with his second bogey-free round in as many days...The win moved him to No. 8 on the Order of Merit, but a missed cut and T32 finish in the final two events dropped him to No. 11 on the final Order of Merit. 

2014: Mackenzie Tour rookie earned first top-10 finish in fifth start at The Players Cup, a T9 with rounds of 72-70 on the weekend.
tourBios.personal: Since graduating from Eastern Michigan University, held jobs in the golf shop, as a bag boy, and the third shift in industrial cleaning...Biggest thrill in golf is three double eagles in one calendar year in 2014...Biggest thrill outside golf is marriage and his daughter's birth...Superstitions include a birdie catcher that his daughter made him...Once met Nick Price in 1999 in front of the Carnoustie clubhouse...Not many people know that he watches Disney movies and knows the words to almost every song...Bucket list items include a dream vacation with his wife and no golf clubs.

dyn.dynBios: Travels to each Mackenzie Tour event in an RV with wife Stephanie, daughter Sam and his three cats
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the Wildfire Invitational presented by PC Financial.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T27th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
